description: Improve the PrimaryButton component by adding loading state, icon support, and improving accessibility.

modifications.value: Add an isLoading prop of type boolean that is optional and defaults to false
Add an icon prop of type React.ReactNode that is optional
Add an iconPosition prop of type "left" | "right" that is optional and defaults to "left"
Add aria-disabled attribute when the button is disabled
Add aria-busy attribute when the button is loading
Add a loading spinner when isLoading is true
Position the icon to the left or right of the text based on the iconPosition prop
